thread.title: Your statements violate norms: EC warns Parrikar
thread.title_full: Your statements violate norms: EC warns Parrikar

title: Your statements violate norms: EC warns Parrikar
text: Your statements violate norms: Election Commission warns Manohar Parrikar Feb 16, 2017, 06.16PM IST TNN NEW DELHI: The Election Commission on Thursday warned Defence Minister and senior Bharatiya Janata Party(BJP)leader Manohar Parrikar to be more careful while addressing election rallies. "Your statements violate said norms (model code of conduct),"EC said while advising Parrikar to be "more careful and circumspect in future." Your statements violate said norms,advise you to be more careful and circumspect in future:EC to Manohar Parrikar (file pic) pic.twitter.com/CHWWg35A7X â€” ANI (@ANI_news) February 16, 2017 On February 1, EC had issued a show cause notice to Parrikar for his bribery remarks when he told residents of a slum near Panaji that it's okay to accept Rs 500 from candidates to attend rallies, but they should cast votes for the BJP only. Parrikar, a day after, responded to a complaint filed against him for violating the model code of conduct when he said "let Election Commission investigate complaints".
